# Prepare traffic report table

Status: Ready to use
Reward tJOY: 300000
Takes time: 3 h
Specification: Distributors
Submited by: AlexZNet

‣ 

**High level summary and purpose:** allow member to learn about reports that are generated by the group lead and prepare one part of it by interacting with publicly-availbale API.

**Detailed scope of work:** Any report from distribution group contains information about bandwidth. Example is any report like [Distribution Round 14 (notion.so)](https://www.notion.so/3e75320c217c4e4dbdc00c6a889c5fec?pvs=21) the table is located under ‘Bandwidth distribution section’. This table is being build using API that was developed for this purpose: [Swagger UI (cryptostarter.info)](https://jsstats.cryptostarter.info/swagger/index.html) Idea behind this bounty is to take data from that API and build table like the one used in report.

As long as this bounty is being linked to report period - it can be completed  during reporting time, which usually comes around Monday (depending on Council terms).

Result should be a table formatted either in Excel, Word or HTML - whatever is easier for participant.

**Time estimate to complete: 1** day

**Discord handle and memberId of a worker (or the Lead) WG to act as the oracle for the bounty:** AlexZNet | C.Sailors#0968
**Actions to do after bounty is complete:** Contact current Distributor workgroup lead to validate HTML table.

**Reward: 0.1M tJOY**
